meeting_purpose: OPTION A: FULL TRINITY PARALLEL WORK - COORDINATION KICKOFF

commander_directive.decision: Go with Option A: Full Trinity Parallel Work
rationale: Each agent works on their strength area
commander_directive.instruction: C1 meet at Hub, all agents decide what's most important, complete maximum autonomous work

trinity_coordination_protocol.code_review: All agents review each other's work

meeting_agenda.item_1: Review current system state (80% designed, 20% deployed)
meeting_agenda.item_2: Identify critical gaps that block production readiness
meeting_agenda.item_3: Assign work packages to C1, C2, C3 based on strengths

c1_current_status.role: Mechanic - Builds what CAN be done RIGHT NOW
c1_current_status.ready_for: Backend implementation, API activation, system deployment
c1_current_status.autonomous_capacity: High - can execute complex backend tasks independently

c1_mechanic_tasks.priority_2: Activate all API endpoints (auth, workspace, knowledge)
deliverables: All 8 API routes functional and tested

trinity_hub.owner: C1 backend service + All agents as clients
trinity_hub.integration: WebSocket for real-time, REST for async

data_flow.cyclotron_to_brain: C1 processes data, C3 queries via API
data_flow.user_to_ai: C3 captures input, C1 routes to Claude, C3 displays
data_flow.pattern_theory: C1 analyzes, C3 visualizes, C2 optimizes

week_1.c1: Backend deployment, database connection, API activation
week_1.c2: API specs, architecture diagrams, integration contracts
week_1.c3: Frontend scaffolding, auth UI, basic chat

week_2.c1: Trinity Hub service, Data Cyclotron, External Brain API
week_2.c2: Performance optimization, security review, scalability plan
week_2.c3: Chat interface complete, dashboard, knowledge query UI
week_2.milestone: Users can chat with Philosopher AI, query knowledge

week_3.c2: Documentation review, API finalization, architecture approval
week_3.c3: UI polish, mobile responsive, user testing, bug fixes
week_3.milestone: Production launch ready - invite first 100 users

schedule.morning: Each agent posts planned work to .trinity/messages/
schedule.evening: Completion status, commit summaries, next day preview

gap_1.issue: Production backend not deployed (running demo server)
